member.name: T:AyaGameEngine2D.GameForm

member.summary: 设置游戏绘制尺寸 ★ 会导致黑屏

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.GameForm.GameDraw
member.summary: 游戏绘制函数 ====================================================== 游戏的核心绘图，在游戏初始化完成后每一帧都执行一次 ★ 必须被重写，由用户实现

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.GameForm.GameIO
member.summary: 游戏IO处理函数 ====================================================== 游戏的核心IO处理，在游戏初始化完成后每一帧都执行一次 ★ 必须被重写，由用户实现

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.Controls.OpenGLPanel.SetDrawRect(System.Int32,System.Int32)

member.name: T:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper
member.summary: 类 名：XmlHelper 功 能：XML文件操作类，提供对XML文件和节点读写操作的基本方法 日 期：2015-03-27 修 改：2015-12-17 作 者：ls9512

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.GetNode(System.String)
member.summary: 获取指定XPath表达式的节点对象
member.param: XPath表达式, 范例1: @"Skill/First/SkillItem", 等效于 @"//Skill/First/SkillItem" 范例2: @"Table[USERNAME='a']" , []表示筛选,USERNAME是Table下的一个子节点. 范例3: @"ApplyPost/Item[@itemName='岗位编号']",@itemName是Item节点的属性.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: 获取指定XPath表达式节点的值
member.param: XPath表达式, 范例1: @"Skill/First/SkillItem", 等效于 @"//Skill/First/SkillItem" 范例2: @"Table[USERNAME='a']" , []表示筛选,USERNAME是Table下的一个子节点. 范例3: @"ApplyPost/Item[@itemName='岗位编号']",@itemName是Item节点的属性.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.GetAttributeValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 获取指定XPath表达式节点的属性值
member.param: XPath表达式, 范例1: @"Skill/First/SkillItem", 等效于 @"//Skill/First/SkillItem" 范例2: @"Table[USERNAME='a']" , []表示筛选,USERNAME是Table下的一个子节点. 范例3: @"ApplyPost/Item[@itemName='岗位编号']",@itemName是Item节点的属性.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.AppendNode(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: 1. 功能：新增节点。 2. 使用条件：将任意节点插入到当前Xml文件中。

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.AppendNode(System.Data.DataSet)
member.summary: 1. 功能：新增节点。 2. 使用条件：将DataSet中的第一条记录插入Xml文件中。
member.param: DataSet的实例，该DataSet中应该只有一条记录

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.RemoveNode(System.String)
member.summary: 删除指定XPath表达式的节点
member.param: XPath表达式, 范例1: @"Skill/First/SkillItem", 等效于 @"//Skill/First/SkillItem" 范例2: @"Table[USERNAME='a']" , []表示筛选,USERNAME是Table下的一个子节点. 范例3: @"ApplyPost/Item[@itemName='岗位编号']",@itemName是Item节点的属性.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.GetValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 获取指定XPath表达式节点的值
member.param: XPath表达式, 范例1: @"Skill/First/SkillItem", 等效于 @"//Skill/First/SkillItem" 范例2: @"Table[USERNAME='a']" , []表示筛选,USERNAME是Table下的一个子节点. 范例3: @"ApplyPost/Item[@itemName='岗位编号']",@itemName是Item节点的属性.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.XmlHelper.GetAttributeValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 获取指定XPath表达式节点的属性值
member.param: XPath表达式, 范例1: @"Skill/First/SkillItem", 等效于 @"//Skill/First/SkillItem" 范例2: @"Table[USERNAME='a']" , []表示筛选,USERNAME是Table下的一个子节点. 范例3: @"ApplyPost/Item[@itemName='岗位编号']",@itemName是Item节点的属性.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.PreciseTimer.GetElapsedTime
member.returns: 与上一次调用的间隔时间

member.name: P:AyaGameEngine2D.Time.TimeScale
member.summary: 每60帧的时间缩放速度，用于调节游戏速度 为0时可暂停游戏中所有依赖时间的运动 为n时则使游戏以N倍速度运行

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.wglCreateContext(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 从设备获取渲染上下文

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.wglUseFontBitmaps(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: The wglUseFontBitmaps function creates a set of bitmap display lists for use in the current OpenGL rendering context. The set of bitmap display lists is based on the glyphs in the currently selected font in the device context. You can then use bitmaps to draw characters in an OpenGL image.
member.param: Specifies the device context whose currently selected font will be used to form the glyph bitmap display lists in the current OpenGL rendering context..
Specifies the first glyph in the run of glyphs that will be used to form glyph bitmap display lists.
Specifies the number of glyphs in the run of glyphs that will be used to form glyph bitmap display lists. The function creates count display lists, one for each glyph in the run.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is TRUE. If the function fails, the return value is FALSE. To get extended error information, call GetLastError.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.wglUseFontOutlines(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: The wglUseFontOutlines function creates a set of display lists, one for each glyph of the currently selected outline font of a device context, for use with the current rendering context.

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.wglShareLists(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Link two render contexts so they share lists (buffer IDs, etc.)
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is TRUE. If the function fails, the return value is FALSE. To get extended error information, call GetLastError.

member.summary: 检测调用时指定键值的状态

member.param: 在z序中的位于被置位的窗口前的窗口句柄

member.returns: 窗口类型的标识号，失败为0

member.name: M:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.timeSetEvent(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object,System.Int32)
member.param: 定时器使用的分辨率（精确度）
若触发方式为回调函数，则为回调函数的指针；若采用事件方式，则为 event object 的handle
可为任意变量或者结构地址，他会在定时器触发的时候回传给回调函数
定时器类型，共有两组旗标

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_ACCEPTFILES
member.summary: Specifies that a window created with this style accepts drag-drop files.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_APPWINDOW
member.summary: Forces a top-level window onto the taskbar when the window is visible.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE
member.summary: Specifies that a window has a border with a sunken edge.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_COMPOSITED
member.summary: Windows XP: Paints all descendants of a window in bottom-to-top painting order using double-buffering. For more information, see Remarks. This cannot be used if the window has a class style of either CS_OWNDC or CS_CLASSDC.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_CONTEXTHELP
member.summary: Includes a question mark in the title bar of the window. When the user clicks the question mark, the cursor changes to a question mark with a pointer. If the user then clicks a child window, the child receives a WM_HELP message. The child window should pass the message to the parent window procedure, which should call the WinHelp function using the HELP_WM_HELP command. The Help application displays a pop-up window that typically contains help for the child window. WS_EX_CONTEXTHELP cannot be used with the WS_MAXIMIZEBOX or WS_MINIMIZEBOX styles.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_CONTROLPARENT
member.summary: The window itself contains child windows that should take part in dialog box navigation. If this style is specified, the dialog manager recurses into children of this window when performing navigation operations such as handling the TAB key, an arrow key, or a keyboard mnemonic.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_DLGMODALFRAME
member.summary: Creates a window that has a double border; the window can, optionally, be created with a title bar by specifying the WS_CAPTION style in the dwStyle parameter.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_LAYERED
member.summary: Windows 2000/XP: Creates a layered window. Note that this cannot be used for child windows. Also, this cannot be used if the window has a class style of either CS_OWNDC or CS_CLASSDC.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL
member.summary: Arabic and Hebrew versions of Windows 98/Me, Windows 2000/XP: Creates a window whose horizontal origin is on the right edge. Increasing horizontal values advance to the left.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_LEFT
member.summary: Creates a window that has generic left-aligned properties. This is the default.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_LEFTSCROLLBAR
member.summary: If the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading order alignment, the vertical scroll bar (if present) is to the left of the client area. For other languages, the style is ignored.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_LTRREADING
member.summary: The window text is displayed using left-to-right reading-order properties. This is the default.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_MDICHILD
member.summary: Creates a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_NOACTIVATE
member.summary: Windows 2000/XP: A top-level window created with this style does not become the foreground window when the user clicks it. The system does not bring this window to the foreground when the user minimizes or closes the foreground window. To activate the window, use the SetActiveWindow or SetForegroundWindow function. The window does not appear on the taskbar by default. To force the window to appear on the taskbar, use the WS_EX_APPWINDOW style.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_NOINHERITLAYOUT
member.summary: Windows 2000/XP: A window created with this style does not pass its window layout to its child windows.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_NOPARENTNOTIFY
member.summary: Specifies that a child window created with this style does not send the WM_PARENTNOTIFY message to its parent window when it is created or destroyed.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW
member.summary: Combines the WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE and WS_EX_WINDOWEDGE styles.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_PALETTEWINDOW
member.summary: Combines the WS_EX_WINDOWEDGE, WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW, and WS_EX_TOPMOST styles.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_RIGHT
member.summary: The window has generic "right-aligned" properties. This depends on the window class. This style has an effect only if the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading-order alignment; otherwise, the style is ignored. Using the WS_EX_RIGHT style for static or edit controls has the same effect as using the SS_RIGHT or ES_RIGHT style, respectively. Using this style with button controls has the same effect as using BS_RIGHT and BS_RIGHTBUTTON styles.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_RIGHTSCROLLBAR
member.summary: Vertical scroll bar (if present) is to the right of the client area. This is the default.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_RTLREADING
member.summary: If the shell language is Hebrew, Arabic, or another language that supports reading-order alignment, the window text is displayed using right-to-left reading-order properties. For other languages, the style is ignored.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_STATICEDGE
member.summary: Creates a window with a three-dimensional border style intended to be used for items that do not accept user input.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_TOOLWINDOW
member.summary: Creates a tool window; that is, a window intended to be used as a floating toolbar. A tool window has a title bar that is shorter than a normal title bar, and the window title is drawn using a smaller font. A tool window does not appear in the taskbar or in the dialog that appears when the user presses ALT+TAB. If a tool window has a system menu, its icon is not displayed on the title bar. However, you can display the system menu by right-clicking or by typing ALT+SPACE.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_TOPMOST
member.summary: Specifies that a window created with this style should be placed above all non-topmost windows and should stay above them, even when the window is deactivated. To add or remove this style, use the SetWindowPos function.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_TRANSPARENT
member.summary: Specifies that a window created with this style should not be painted until siblings beneath the window (that were created by the same thread) have been painted. The window appears transparent because the bits of underlying sibling windows have already been painted. To achieve transparency without these restrictions, use the SetWindowRgn function.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStylesEx.WS_EX_WINDOWEDGE
member.summary: Specifies that a window has a border with a raised edge.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_BORDER
member.summary: The window has a thin-line border.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_CAPTION
member.summary: The window has a title bar (includes the WS_BORDER style).

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_CHILD
member.summary: The window is a child window. A window with this style cannot have a menu bar. This style cannot be used with the WS_POPUP style.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_CLIPCHILDREN
member.summary: Excludes the area occupied by child windows when drawing occurs within the parent window. This style is used when creating the parent window.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_CLIPSIBLINGS
member.summary: Clips child windows relative to each other; that is, when a particular child window receives a WM_PAINT message, the WS_CLIPSIBLINGS style clips all other overlapping child windows out of the region of the child window to be updated. If WS_CLIPSIBLINGS is not specified and child windows overlap, it is possible, when drawing within the client area of a child window, to draw within the client area of a neighboring child window.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_DISABLED
member.summary: The window is initially disabled. A disabled window cannot receive input from the user. To change this after a window has been created, use the EnableWindow function.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_DLGFRAME
member.summary: The window has a border of a style typically used with dialog boxes. A window with this style cannot have a title bar.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_GROUP
member.summary: The window is the first control of a group of controls. The group consists of this first control and all controls defined after it, up to the next control with the WS_GROUP style. The first control in each group usually has the WS_TABSTOP style so that the user can move from group to group. The user can subsequently change the keyboard focus from one control in the group to the next control in the group by using the direction keys. You can turn this style on and off to change dialog box navigation. To change this style after a window has been created, use the SetWindowLong function.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_HSCROLL
member.summary: The window has a horizontal scroll bar.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_MAXIMIZEBOX
member.summary: The window has a maximize button. Cannot be combined with the WS_EX_CONTEXTHELP style. The WS_SYSMENU style must also be specified.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_MINIMIZEBOX
member.summary: The window has a minimize button. Cannot be combined with the WS_EX_CONTEXTHELP style. The WS_SYSMENU style must also be specified.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_OVERLAPPED
member.summary: The window is an overlapped window. An overlapped window has a title bar and a border.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_OVERLAPPEDWINDOW
member.summary: The window is an overlapped window.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_POPUP
member.summary: The window is a pop-up window. This style cannot be used with the WS_CHILD style.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_POPUPWINDOW
member.summary: The window is a pop-up window. The WS_CAPTION and WS_POPUPWINDOW styles must be combined to make the window menu visible.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_SIZEFRAME
member.summary: The window has a sizing border.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_SYSMENU
member.summary: The window has a window menu on its title bar. The WS_CAPTION style must also be specified.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_TABSTOP
member.summary: The window is a control that can receive the keyboard focus when the user presses the TAB key. Pressing the TAB key changes the keyboard focus to the next control with the WS_TABSTOP style. You can turn this style on and off to change dialog box navigation. To change this style after a window has been created, use the SetWindowLong function. For user-created windows and modeless dialogs to work with tab stops, alter the message loop to call the IsDialogMessage function.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_VISIBLE
member.summary: The window is initially visible. This style can be turned on and off by using the ShowWindow or SetWindowPos function.

member.name: F:AyaGameEngine2D.Win32.WindowStyles.WS_VSCROLL
member.summary: The window has a vertical scroll bar.
